debates.showAs: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: Committee Stage
Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an offence for the action commonly known as catfishing and for that purpose to provide for the identification of such an offence; to amend and extend the Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person Act 1997 and to provide for consequential amendments to the Broadcasting Act 2009; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb éard é an gníomh ar a dtugtar de ghnáth claonmhealltóireacht ar líne agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú chun cion den sórt sin a shainaithint; do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine, 1997 agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasuithe iarmhartacha ar an Acht Craolacháin, 2009; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Non-Fatal Offences Against the Person (Amendment) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú), 2024

debates.showAs: Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Disability (Personalised Budgets) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Disability Act 2005 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú an Achta um Míchumas, 2005 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: Second Stage
Domestic Violence (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Domestic Violence Act 2018 by means of extending the restrictions on those present in courtroom proceedings, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Fhoréigean Baile, 2018 trí na srianta a bheidh orthu siúd a bheidh i láthair in imeachtaí i seomra cúirte a leathnú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Sex Offenders (Amendment) (Coercive Control) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Sex Offenders (Amendment) (Coercive Control) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Sex Offenders Act 2001 to make provision for the requirement, in the interests of the common good, for the notification of information to An Garda Síochána, by persons who have committed the offence of coercive control and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chiontóirí Gnéis, 2001 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir lena cheangal, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, ar dhaoine a bhfuil an cion arb éard é smachtú comhéigneach déanta acu faisnéis a chur in iúl don Gharda Síochána agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chiontóirí Gnéis (Leasú) (Smachtú Comhéigneach), 2023

debates.showAs: Health (Assisted Human Reproduction) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Health (Assisted Human Reproduction) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body, to be known in the Irish language as An Coiste Comhairleach um Chóireáil Atáirgthe Dhaonna Chuidithe or in the English language as the Assisted Human Reproduction Treatment Advisory Committee, to advise on criteria for eligibility for financial assistance with assisted human reproduction treatment and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú comhlacht ar a dtabharfar, sa Ghaeilge, An Coiste Comhairleach um Chóireáil Atáirgthe Dhaonna Chuidithe, nó sa Bhéarla, the Assisted Human Reproduction Treatment Advisory Committee, chun comhairle a thabhairt maidir le critéir incháilitheachta le haghaidh cúnamh airgeadais i ndáil le hatáirgeadh daonna cuidithe agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Education (Relationships and Sexuality Education) (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Education Act 1988 (as amended) to make provision for the implementation of relationship and sexuality education in primary and post-primary schools without any influence of religious ethos on relationship and sexuality education, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Act do leasú an Achta Oideachais, 1988 (arna leasú) chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le hoideachas caidreamh agus gnéasachta a chur i ngníomh i mbunscoileanna agus in iarbhunscoileanna gan tionchar ar bith a bheith ag éiteas creidimh ar oideachas caidreamh agus gnéasachta, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Oideachas Caidreamh agus Gnéasachta) (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Curragh of Kildare (Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage
Curragh of Kildare (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Curragh of Kildare Act 1961 to make provision for the management and use of the Curragh whereby the Minister may grant a licence to persons for continuous occupation of any part of the Curragh for a specified period of time, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht Churrach Chill Dara, 1961 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le bainistiú agus le húsáid an Churraigh trína bhféadfaidh an tAire ceadúnas a dheonú do dhaoine chun aon chuid den Churrach a áitiú go leanúnach ar feadh tréimhse shonraithe ama, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Report and Final Stages
Protection of Private Residencies (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Order for Committee Stage
Protection of Private Residencies (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for the prevention of the targeted picketing of a private residence and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun cosc a chur le picéadú spriocdhírithe ar áit chónaithe phríobháideach agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Private Residences (Against Targeted Picketing) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Áiteanna Cónaithe Príobháideacha a Chosaint (Ar Phicéadú Spriocdhírithe), 2021

debates.showAs: Clean Air (Smoky Coal Ban) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the introduction of regulations to prohibit the sale, marketing, distribution and burning of bituminous (smoky) coal on a nationwide basis; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le rialacháin a thabhairt isteach do thoirmeasc gual biotúmanach (toiteach) a dhíol, a mhargú, a dháileadh agus a dhó, ar bhonn náisiúnta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aer Glan (Cosc ar Ghual Toiteach), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Hate Crime) Bill 2020: Second Stage
Criminal Justice (Hate Crime) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for hate crime; the imposition of a heavier penalty on an offender whose commission of a relevant offence (a list of which is contained in the schedule to this Act) is accompanied by hate crime against an individual based on said individual's asylum or refugee status, race, colour, religion, nationality, ethnicity, disability, sexual orientation, transgender identity, sex characteristics, age or perceived age and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le coireacht fuatha; maidir le pionós níos déine a fhorchur ar chiontóir a bhfuil ag gabháil le cion iomchuí arna dhéanamh aige nó aici (is cion a luaitear sa liosta cionta atá sa Sceideal a ghabhann leis an Acht seo) coireacht fuatha i gcoinne pearsa aonair atá bunaithe ar stádas tearmainn nó dídeanaí, cine, dath, creideamh, náisiúntacht, eitneacht, míchumas, gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht trasinscne nó tréithe gnéis nó aois nó aois mheasta na pearsan aonair sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Coireacht Fuatha), 2020

debates.showAs: Curragh of Kildare (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Curragh of Kildare Act 1961 to make provision for the management and use of the Curragh whereby the Minister may grant a licence to persons for continuous occupation of any part of the Curragh for a specified period of time, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht Churrach Chill Dara, 1961 chun socrú 
a dhéanamh maidir le bainistiú agus úsáid an Churraigh trína bhféadfaidh an 
tAire ceadúnas a dheonú do dhaoine chun aon chuid den Churrach a áitiú go 
leanúnach ar feadh tréimhse shonraithe ama, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh 
nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Shared Maternity Leave and Benefit Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Shared Maternity Leave and Benefit Bill 2018: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Shared Maternity Leave and Benefit Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
Shared Maternity Leave and Benefit Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Maternity Protection Acts 1994 and 2004 and the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 to make provision whereby parents can share their entitlement to maternity leave and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Chosaint Mháithreachais, 1994 agus 2004 agus an Achta Comhdhlúite Leasa Shóisialaigh, 2005 chun socrú a dhéanamh trína bhféadfaidh tuismitheoirí a dteidlíocht chun saoire máithreachais a chomhroinnt agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Shared Maternity Leave and Benefit Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhroinnt Saoire agus Sochair Máithreachais, 2018

debates.showAs: Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions)(No. 2) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) (No. 2) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 and the Equal Status Act 2000 by prohibiting discrimination on the basis of a person's mental health status and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 trí thoirmeasc a chur ar idirdhealú ar bhonn stádas meabhairshláinte duine agus chun socrú a dhéanamh i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Equality (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 and the Equal Status Act 2000 by prohibiting discrimination on the basis of a person's social and economic background; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 trí thoirmeasc a chur le hidirdhealú ar bhonn cúlra sóisialta agus eacnamaíoch duine; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Aggravation by Prejudice) Bill 2016: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Aggravation by Prejudice) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
Criminal Justice (Aggravation by Prejudice) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Aggravation by Prejudice) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision for aggravation by prejudice of offences in circumstances where an offence, at the time of commission, is accompanied by prejudice relating to the race, colour or ethnic origin, a disability, sexual orientation or transgender identity of a person and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cionta a fhorthromú de dheasca claontachta in imthosca ina bhfuil ag gabháil le cion, tráth a dhéanta, claontacht a bhaineann le cine, dath nó bunadh eitneach, míchumas, gnéaschlaonadh nó féiniúlacht trasinscne duine agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Forthromú de dheasca Claontachta), 2016 2016
